title: Tuesday Post Show (07-12-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (07-12-22)
description:
We’re back for our first post-show since vacation. We talk to Amy who is still at home with a bad cough. We get more in depth sharing stories from our vacations that we didn’t get to on the air. Eddie shares that his vacation was actually more exhausting than it was relaxing. We get an update from Raymundo’s blind item. We get into a big discussion about what is going on with our building and dealing with crazy construction.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
We’re back for our first post-show since vacation. We talk to Amy who is still at home with a bad cough. We get more in depth sharing stories from our vacations that we didn’t get to on the air. Eddie shares that his vacation was actually more exhausting than it was relaxing. We get an update from Raymundo’s blind item. We get into a big discussion about what is going on with our building and dealing with crazy construction.
